scripts.clean: rimraf dist lib && npm run clean:compile
scripts.clean:compile: rimraf src/**/*.map src/**/*.js src/**/*.d.ts tests/**/*.js tests/**/*.map tests/**/*.d.ts demo/**/*.js demo/**/*.map demo/**/*.d.ts
scripts.copy-assets: if [ -d src/assets ]; then cp -rv src/assets/ dist/assets/; fi
scripts.posttest:web: npm run clean && npm run compile
scripts.test: npm run test:web && npm run test:python
scripts.docs: npm run docs:web && npm run docs:python
scripts.build:web: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run copy-assets && npm run copy-styles
scripts.build:python: rm -rf build/source && find . -name '*.pyc' -delete && node buildPython.js && cp -r ./phovea_security_flask build/source/
scripts.build: npm run build:web && npm run build:python
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.predist:web: npm run build:web && npm run docs:web
scripts.dist: npm run dist:web && npm run dist:python
scripts.predist:python: npm run build:python && npm run docs:python
scripts.dist:web: mkdir dist && cd build && tar cvzf ../dist/phovea_security_flask.tar.gz *
